programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith is in Sweden testing the brand new Volvo S60 Polestar super saloon against its racing car cousin - the competition car of double Swedish Touring Car Champion Fredrick Ekblom.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato is joined by former F1 driver Karun Chandhok as they pit a Honda Civic Type-R, a Seat Leon Cupra-R, a Renault Megane RS and a Audi S3 against one another to see who will be crowned king of the hot-hatches in an all-new Deathmatch

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson heads to the German HQ of the Dakar rally winning Mini X-Raid team, to experience the three toughest jobs in motorsport. She'll learn how to be a navigator, mechanic and driver before taking on Dakar rally legend Nani Roma

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Jonny face off in the series' first van versus pick-up challenge.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson attempts to drive flat out in Aston Martin's new Vanquish S. The 520bhp, Â£175,000-plus super-coupe accelerates from 0-60 in 4.8 seconds and is capable of over 200mph.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford flies out on Alan Sugar's private jet to test the brand new Audi TT, Vicki Butler-Henderson attempts a new land speed record, and Tiff Needell enters the inaugural D1GB drifting competition.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason & Tiff pit the new Ford Focus RS against Mitsubishi Evo X. Audi's new Lamborghini engined supercar, the R8 V10, is under scrutiny. Tom Ford examines the brand new Citroen C3 Picasso from the point of view of a truly 21st Century family man.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson report on Fifth Gear's fastest ever crash test when we crash a Smart into a concrete block...flat out. Jason Plato drives through five countries in 24 hours.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear Quentin Willson and Tiff Needell stage a massive head-on collision by piloting two remote controlled cars into each other at 60 mph.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out which is the fastest - the Renault Twingo GT or the Fiat Panda 100HP. Tiff Needell and Jason Plato go head to head. This time it's small coupes as the Porsche Cayman comes up against the new BMW 135i Coupe.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson tries to crack 150mph as she makes an attempt on the Blindfolded Land Speed World Record. Can Vicki hold her nerve and set a new record for driving in a straight line?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Quentin Willson, Tiff Needell, Vicki Butler-Henderson and Adrian Simpson visit the British International Motorshow. They look at some of the cars they didn't see at the recent Paris show.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson test drives Volvo's new off-roader. He concludes because of their attention to safety, the environment and the family-size accommodation Volvo have created a different kind of 4x4.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell poses the question, "What's the best GT car you can buy for Â£90,000?" He tests the top contenders which both come from Stuttgart - the Mercedes SL55 AMG and the Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell reports on fifth Gear's project to build a 200mph car. Last time we saw our Lotus it blew up in a cloud of smoke, but it's back, repaired, and even more modified.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson, Adrian Simpson and Tom Ford visit the Paris motor show. They look at many of the new models revealed there including the Porsche Cayenne and Bentley Continental GT.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell teams up with supermodel Jodie Kidd to race a Maserati at the Monza grand prix circuit in Italy. Jason Plato visits the Top Marques Monaco Motorshow.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In an astonishing series of experiments Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson find out just how dangerous ordinary items can be, and how you can best keep them under control in our cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell travels to California to test Nissan's new 350Z sports car. Is it a worthy successor to the company's 1970s 240Z? And is it as good to drive as it looks? Tiff thinks so.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell sets out to see whether it's possible to drive along the A537 from Macclesfield to Buxton, the most dangerous road in Britain, safely in the first Porsche Cayman in the country.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff try to master the controls of the Red Dragon, a 1700 hp Monster Truck. Jonny drives the new Renault Megane. Tom tests BMW's premium luxury car, the 7 Series. Tom Cave - a 17 year old Welsh rally sensation challenges Vicki.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw tests whether the claimed 0-62mph acceleration times are actually true or not. Vicki Butler-Henderson heads out to the track in two Porsches. Tiff Needell has the first TV test of the world's first underwater car, the Rinspeed Squba.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits the brand-new Renault Sport Clio 200 against a tough competitor from the past - the Renault Clio 182 Cup. Retired Formula One driver, and current TV pundit David Coulthard, meets up with Tiff Needell for an extreme van driving challenge

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson welcomes Michael Schumacher to the show, for his only British television appearance this year. They go head to head on the track, in a very unusual challenge.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Do cars explode like they do in the movies? Tiff Needell and Adrian Simpson stage their own car chase and then watch the experts who've worked on James Bond movies take over for the special effects.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell test drives the new Aston Martin V8 Vantage, billed as the most desirable sportscar in the world. Jon Bentley reveals definitively whether expensive petrol is worth the extra cash.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests two cars that are low, light and very fast - Lotus Exige S v Caterham CSR. Tom visits Spain to drive the Toyota Landcruiser. Jason Plato drives the Mercedes CLK63 Black. Tiff teaches Heston Blumenthal the art of powersliding.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff pits Renault's latest hot hatch the stripped out and hardcore Megane R26.R, against a Caterham CDX. Jonny brings us his verdict on the brand new Ford Ka. Tim delves into the world of car crime, to make us more aware of what criminals look for.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson road tests the Renault VelSatis. Renault's attempt to tackle the executive car sector dominated by Mercedes, Audi and BMW has unusual styling but he likes it.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: It's the ultimate showdown, a quarter mile drag between a Formula One car, a superbike and a racing powerboat to find out which is quickest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford takes puts the Grande Punto Abarth through its hot hatch paces. Tim Shaw finds out if it's possible to save huge amounts of money by servicing your car yourself. Bruno Senna joins the programme as a special guest presenter.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki is the first journalist in the world to drive the astonishing Â£150,000 Gibbs Aquada, an amphibious car that breaks the mould. Vicki tests it out on the open road and the ocean wave.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson makes an unprecedented attempt to hit 200mph in an A1 Grand Prix car. Tom Ford and Jonny Smith take the seven newest hot hatches on sale and decide which is best.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith reveals the secrets of 21 st century car crash testing. He goes behind the scenes at a crash test performed by experts EuroNCAP, before conducting his own shocking crash test between a car and a van.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason experiences a cutting edge Formula One driving simulator, Tiff races 2 four wheel drive saloons head to head and Vicki gets behind the wheel of the multi-million pound Aston Martin DB5 as driven by James Bond in Goldfinger.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear showcases a collection of the show's highly complex and high-octane crash tests from the show's twenty-year history.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff enters the opening round of the exclusive Lamborghini Super Trofeo race series - with advice from the man with every petrolhead's dream job - Lamborghini chief test driver Giorgio Sanna.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki unveils the long-awaited new Tesla Model 3 electric car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff puts Aston Martin's stunning four door Rapide through its paces on road and track, Vicki samples the brand new, Â£200,000 Rolls Royce Ghost and Jason pits the Nissan 370Z Roadster against its BMW Z4 rival in a drop-top shootout.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson enters the brutal world of professional truck racing. She drives a 1100bhp truck herself, before heading to the Nurburgring where she joins the pit crew of former champion, German Jochen Hahn.
